mtgmgr.action
Class JSONGridAction

java.lang.Object
  com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      mtgmgr.action.ActionWrapper
          mtgmgr.action.JSONGridAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ParameterAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware
public class JSONGridAction
extends ActionWrapper

ClassName: JSONGridAction

Description: This class exists to suppport struts-jquery-grid plugin and this action is chained on after any other action to transform the result into the JSON format which jqGrid can parse.

Date: 03 September 2010

Version:
1.0
Author:
Yeong Lee Wei
See Also:
